title: Stage Lv6-P4-S25
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I wondered what he was doing.
Could you tell me where the meeting room is?
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I wondered what he was doing.
Could you tell me where the meeting room is?

sentences.kr: 이것에 대해 누구에게 물어봐야 할지 모르겠습니다.
sentences.en: I don't know who I should ask about this.
Could you tell me when the project will be completed?
I wonder why the meeting was postponed.
Do you know how the budget will be allocated?

sentences.kr: 누가 이 결정을 내렸는지 말씀해 주시겠습니까?
sentences.en: Could you tell me who made this decision?

sentences.kr: 어떤 전략을 사용할지 아직 결정하지 못했습니다.
sentences.en: We haven't decided which strategy to use.
